entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
